I.name: Doom 'n Gloom
description:
{{sbc|Passive - Doom:}} Periodically, '''Vex''' gains ''Doom'': empowering her next [[champion ability|basic ability]] to {{tip|knockdown|knock down}} and {{tip|fear}} enemies hit for {{pp|0.75 to 1.5 for 4|1;6;9;13}} seconds, during which they are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by {{pp|type=distance from '''Vex'''|60 to 99 for 11|250 to 800|key=%|formula=60% + 3.9% for every 55 units away from Vex}}. If ''{{ai|Looming Darkness 2|Vex|Looming Darkness}}'' triggers ''Doom'', enemies hit will {{tip|flee}} from the epicenter instead.
''Doom's'' cooldown {{sti|cdr|resets}} upon [[death|respawning]].

{{sbc|Innate - Gloom:}} Nearby enemy {{tip|champions}} and {{tip|monsters}} that {{tip|dash}} or {{tip|blink}} will be marked with ''Gloom'' for 6 seconds. '''Vex's''' next basic attack or basic ability hit will detonate the mark, the basic attack becoming {{tip|projectile|non-projectile}}. ''{{ai|Looming Darkness|Vex}}'' will also inflict ''Gloom'', but cannot detonate it.

''Gloom's'' detonation deals {{pp|30 to 140|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{ccs|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}|magic}} and {{sti|cdr|refunds}} 25% of ''Doom's'' cooldown. Against {{tip|monsters}}, this instead deals {{pp|40 to 60 for 5|1;6;9;13;16|key=%}} damage and {{sti|cdr|refunds}} 10% of ''Doom's'' cooldown.
I.descriptionHtml:
Passive - Doom: Periodically, Vex gains Doom: empowering her next champion ability to knock down and fear enemies hit for 1;6;9;13 ‒ undefined seconds, during which they are slowed by 250 to 800 ‒ undefined. If Vex's Looming Darkness triggers Doom, enemies hit will flee from the epicenter instead.
Doom's cooldown resets upon death.
Innate - Gloom: Nearby enemy champions and monsters that dash or blink will be marked with Gloom for 6 seconds. Vex's next basic attack or basic ability hit will detonate the mark, the basic attack becoming non-projectile. Vex's Looming Darkness will also inflict Gloom, but cannot detonate it.
Gloom's detonation deals 30 − 140 (based on level) (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage / magic">Unknown value: ccs / bonus magic damage / magic and refunds 25% of Doom's cooldown. Against monsters, this instead deals 1;6;9;13;16 ‒ undefined damage and refunds 10% of Doom's cooldown.
I.notes:
* ''Gloom'' will mark {{ui|Rift Herald}} and {{ui|Rift Scuttler}} when they use their dashes.
* ''Gloom'' can mark {{tip|clone|clones}}, but not other {{tip|pet|pets}}.
* ''Gloom's'' mark has a very brief cooldown and refreshes on subsequent dashes or blinks nearby enemies use.
* ''Gloom's'' mark duration will refresh to {{fd|0.5}} seconds when '''Vex''' starts an attack windup against a target that has a mark which is about to expire.
* ''Gloom'' will mark enemies even if they are {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Gloom'' will mark enemies that are inside the detection radius when they blink, but will not mark those that blink inside from far away.{{bug|2}}
* ''Doom's'' cooldown starts as soon as the basic ability is cast.
* Non-champions (e.g. {{ui|Rift Scuttler}}) are not {{tip|knockdown|knocked down}} by the fear-empowered ability.{{bug|2}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block all of ''Doom's'' effects but not ''Gloom's'' empowered attack nor mark.
* Nearby enemies that become displaced do not count for being marked by ''Gloom''.
* '''Vex's''' basic abilities use a different icon when ''Doom'' is ready:
** [[File:Vex Mistral Bolt 2.png|20px|border]] Mistral Bolt
** [[File:Vex Personal Space 2.png|20px|border]] Personal Space
** [[File:Vex Looming Darkness 2.png|20px|border]] Looming Darkness

Q.name: Mistral Bolt
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vex''' launches a wave of mist in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit. After travelling 500 units, the wave accelerates but also narrows itself.
Q.descriptionHtml: Active: Vex launches a wave of mist in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. After travelling 500 units, the wave accelerates but also narrows itself.
Q.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
** ''Mistral Bolt'' will fire from wherever '''Vex''' is at the end of the cast time, towards the originally targeted location or 1200 units in the originally targeted direction if cast beyond that.

W.name: Personal Space
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vex''' emits a shockwave around her before the cast time, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|shield|shielding}} herself for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
W.descriptionHtml: Active: Vex emits a shockwave around her before the cast time, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and shielding herself for 2.5 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|50 to 150}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|80 to 240}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
W.notes:
* ''Personal Space'' can be buffered {{fd|0.1}} seconds before it comes off cooldown or becomes available otherwise.
* '''Vex''' can move during ''Personal Space's'' cast time.

effects.str:
• Shield Strength: (+ 75% AP)
  • Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)

E.name: Looming Darkness
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vex''' tosses her ''Shadow'' to explode at the target location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit for 2 seconds. The explosion widens based on cast distance.
''Looming Darkness will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vex tosses her Shadow to explode at the target location, dealing magic damage and slowing enemies hit for 2 seconds. The explosion widens based on cast distance.
Looming Darkness will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Slow: %

R.name: Shadow Surge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Vex''' sends her ''Shadow'' in the target direction that grants {{tip|sight}} around its {{tt|trajectory|Does not see into bush or across terrain}} and deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.
''Shadow'' stops upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}}, marking and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds. ''Shadow Surge'' can be recast while the target is marked.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Vex''' {{tip|dashes}} towards the marked target with {{tip|displacement immunity}}. Upon arrival, the mark is consumed to deal {{as|magic damage}}.
If the target dies within 6 seconds of being marked, '''Vex''' can cast ''Shadow Surge'' again within 12 seconds at no cost after {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Vex sends her Shadow in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory and deals magic damage to enemies hit.
Shadow stops upon hitting an enemy champion, marking and revealing them for 4 seconds. Shadow Surge can be recast while the target is marked.
Recast: Vex dashes towards the marked target with displacement immunity. Upon arrival, the mark is consumed to deal magic damage.
If the target dies within 6 seconds of being marked, Vex can cast Shadow Surge again within 12 seconds at no cost after 0.5 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Impact Magic Damage|{{ap|150 to 350}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|75+150 to 175+350}} {{as|(+ {{ap|20+50}}% AP)}}}}
R.notes:
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* '''Vex's''' dash will track the target if they change locations.
** She will not stop tracking the target until she reaches them, as there is no maximum tracking distance.
* ''Shadow Surge'' grants sight of the area along its path for {{fd|{{tt|0.4|Estimated}}}} seconds each.
* ''Shadow Surge'' cannot be recast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, or if the target is {{tip|untargetable}}.
* ''Shadow Surge'' may also be recast if the target died to the ability.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Vex''' is dashing:
** All movement spells are disabled during the first {{fd|0.25}} seconds of the dash.
{{ct|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|items=true,,,interrupts,interrupts,,interrupts|consume=true|spells=true,interrupts,true,true,false|interrupts=death}}
